articles.title: Thank God for fearless South Park and their Meghan and Harry episode – they are keeping US satire alive - Independent.ie
articles.description: Television satire in America is on its knees. Pretty much everyone agrees that The Simpsons peaked a long time ago, although opinions as to precisely when during its 34 years on air this happened differ greatly.

articles.title: Guns N’ Roses plots extensive 2023 world tour with 4 Canadian dates - Global News
articles.description: Guns N' Roses will bookend the North American leg of their 2023 tour with shows in Moncton and Vancouver.
articles.content:
Guns N’ Roses is hitting the road in 2023, mapping out an extensive, five-month world tour that will hit stadiums, arenas and festivals around the world, including multiple shows in Canada.
